profile.name: Paco
profile.title: Presales Cloud Architect at Telefónica
profile.description: La tecnología es mi hobby, me gustan los retos técnicos que me llevan al aprendizaje continuo. Por experiencia tengo perfil generalista de sistemas pero me atrae el mundo del soporte al desarrollo y aplicaciones.

challenges.description:
Responsibility for the definition of the technical architecture of Cloud solutions for customers in presales, negotiation, transition, transformation and production phases:
Responsible for specialized technical dialogue with users and sponsors, as well as any other player who is involved in determining customer needs in ICT services.
To establish the legacy technical architecture of the customer "As-Is".
To designing the technical architecture of the final stage of the customer, "To-Be", based on user requirements and other limiting factors such as budget, costs and time. 
To ensure that the technical architecture is consistent, comprehensive, effective, efficient, manageable and billable; in such a manner that ensures cost optimization using the highest possible degree of industrialization based on Telefónica portfolio (avoiding both undersizing and oversizing).
To guarantee maximum robustness of the technical architecture, "to be" scenario, in a way that ensures both the portability of applications between different technologies, such as availability, capacity, continuity and safety of service.
To deliver requirements for acceptance testing, which together with designers, test engineers and user, to determine whether the requirements defined for “To-Be” scenario have been met.
To deliver proof of concept, models, user guides and prototypes that describe the architecture to meet the customer's requirements.
To manages both client and internal planning, organization, implementation, evaluation and documentation of the Due Diligence.
